about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Modern Heritage of Traditional Craftsmanship
about.description: Hui Embroidery is dedicated to preserving and promoting traditional Chinese embroidery craftsmanship, combining modern aesthetic concepts to create exquisite works with contemporary characteristics. We believe that every stitch carries profound cultural connotations.
